response.overview: When neurodivergent Alex is invited to his first party at the age of 18 by someone he does not know, his overanxious parents go into overdrive to protect him, convinced there must be an ulterior motive for the invitation. Bullied throughout secondary school, with no happy memories or friends as a result, Alex sees the party as his first chance to change all that — if he can convince his parents to let him go, stay away and leave him to it…
response.title: The Invitation
